akn:section.akn:heading: Land subject to prohibition on leasing

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1027. Land subject to prohibition on leasing The Secretary shall not issue any lease under this chapter on those lands subject to the prohibition provided under section 226–3 of this title. (Pub. L. 91–581, § 29, as added Pub. L. 100–443, § 5(d), Sept. 22, 1988, 102 Stat. 1769; amended Pub. L. 109–58, title II, § 236(27), Aug. 8, 2005, 119 Stat. 673.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2005—Pub. L. 109–58 inserted section catchline.
